mapper.select: SELECT A.C_CrateCode, A.C_Condition, A.C_Create_Date, A.C_Production_LotNo, B.CL_ProductionQty C_ProductionQty, B.CL_MachineCode C_MachineCode, C.Equipment_Info_Name C_MachineName, B.CL_MachineCode2 C_MachineCode2, D.Equipment_Info_Name C_MachineName2 FROM Crate_tbl A left outer join Crate_Lot_tbl B on A.C_Production_LotNo = B.CL_LotNo left outer join Equipment_Info_tbl C on B.CL_MachineCode = C.Equipment_Info_Code left outer join Equipment_Info_tbl D on B.CL_MachineCode2 = D.Equipment_Info_Code order by C_CrateCode
SELECT C_CrateCode, C_Condition, C_Create_Date, C_Production_LotNo FROM Crate_tbl where C_CrateCode = #{crateCode}

SELECT A.C_CrateCode, A.C_Condition, A.C_Create_Date, A.C_Production_LotNo, B.CL_ItemCode C_ItemCode FROM Crate_tbl A left outer join Crate_Lot_tbl B on A.C_Production_LotNo = B.CL_LotNo where A.C_CrateCode = #{CrateCode} and A.C_Condition = #{Condition}

SELECT A.C_CrateCode, A.C_Condition, A.C_Create_Date, A.C_Production_LotNo, B.CL_MachineCode C_MachineCode, B.CL_Qty C_Qty, B.CL_ItemCode C_ItemCode, C.Product_Item_Name C_ItemName FROM Crate_tbl A inner join Crate_Lot_tbl B on A.C_Production_LotNo = B.CL_LotNo and B.CL_MachineCode = #{machineCode} inner join Product_Info_tbl C on B.CL_ItemCode = C.Product_Item_Code where A.C_Condition = #{condition}
SELECT concat('N', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d'), #{C_LotNo}, lpad(count(*)+1, 4, 0)) FROM Crate_tbl where C_Create_Date > current_date();
